name: Diligent
headline: GenAI assistants for fintech risk and compliance operations
description:
We help fintech risk and AML compliance teams automate and strengthen routine customer due diligence tasks with LLMs. Our AI assistants slash cost-to-comply, improve risk detection and free up capacity for investigations that require human expertise and decision making. 

Fintechs and banks use us to automate workflows like running thorough due diligence on a legal entity, reviewing customer documents like registry extracts, proofs of address etc and remediating false positive alerts from their AML systems.

founders.name: Edoardo Maschio, Founder
founders.description: I was an investment associate and chief of staff @ Rocket Internet early-stage team. Incubated and invested multiple ventures with the fintech team. Previously worked as Junior associate @ Boston Consulting Group.

founders.name: Ahmed Gaber, Founder
founders.description:
I'm Co-founder and CTO at Diligent and I worked in Fintech for more than a decade.
Most recently I was VP of engineering at Billie (Europe’s largest B2B BNPL) and led multiple engineering teams on various domains: business identification, fraud, credit, and AML risk. Previously I was a technical PM and software engineer at Funding Circle.

# AI to catch risky businesses
Fraud and AML teams of fintechs and banks use Diligent to automate and strengthen due diligence on business customers
Thank you! Your submission has been received!
Oops! Something went wrong while submitting the form.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650731ef9f7d88494ce3e3f2/6531f26de33609d9a0a3ccee_YC.png)
How it works
## **Verifying small businesses legitimacy is tough** - GenAI brings investigative reasoning at scale to accelerate and enhance due diligence.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650731ef9f7d88494ce3e3f2/65b1926a0060ab23eee72c5a_search%20\(1\).svg)
Web presence
Investigate a business's online footprint, flag involvement in high-risk activities, and identify a bad reputation on reviews or social media
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650731ef9f7d88494ce3e3f2/6749ff927eebd80345a0492a_Onlinefootprint.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650731ef9f7d88494ce3e3f2/65b18de0b6c4064b5a081863_check-circle.svg)
Networks
Identify connections to high-risk entities, fraud rings or suspicious activities through shared entity details, addresses or people.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650731ef9f7d88494ce3e3f2/6749f07cb77805c8a4f7255e_2Fraudulent_address_graphic.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650731ef9f7d88494ce3e3f2/65b18de0b6c4064b5a081866_fi_11401743.svg)
Monitoring
Track ongoing changes in business activities, reputation deterioration, or ownership to detect emerging risks.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650731ef9f7d88494ce3e3f2/6749f6ba04d10cf9b89e8a25_Alerts.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650731ef9f7d88494ce3e3f2/65b1926a0060ab23eee72c5a_search%20\(1\).svg)
Risk assistant
Investigate holistically the nature of business of your SMB customers and transaction counterparties - industry classification, address analyses, website reviews and online presence risk signals
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650731ef9f7d88494ce3e3f2/65b18de018ac9e0c2a48f914_buildings.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650731ef9f7d88494ce3e3f2/65b18de0b6c4064b5a081863_check-circle.svg)
Screening assistant
Investigate automatically alerts from your existing Sanctions/PEP/AdverseMedia systems and slash time spent remediating false positives
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650731ef9f7d88494ce3e3f2/65b18de0dbbdf32eac1c18d1_Icon.svg)
False positive
The adverse media article is not referring to the customer and is materially irrelevant
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650731ef9f7d88494ce3e3f2/65b18de0b6c4064b5a081866_fi_11401743.svg)
KYB assistant
Verify business information and instantly validate customer uploaded documents (register extract, proof of address etc...) to reduce onboarding friction
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650731ef9f7d88494ce3e3f2/65d307c510ea2d43f18623e7_gaphic.png)
![slider arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650731ef9f7d88494ce3e3f2/650f034e94ef9ab77573bf01_Features.svg)
![slider arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650731ef9f7d88494ce3e3f2/650f034e94ef9ab77573bf01_Features.svg)

[Schedule a demo](https://godiligent.ai/<https:/calendly.com/edoardomaschio/30min>)
## Frequently asked questions
Here is some more info about us
What does Diligent offer?
We build AI solutions that enhance your risk and AML compliance teams' capabilities by automating and strengthening customer due diligence controls. Our services are utilized by fintechs and banks to streamline workflows such as conducting risk investigations on legal entities, reviewing customer documents (for example, registry extracts and proofs of address), and remediating false positive alerts from AML systems.
Is Diligent allowed by regulator and safe to use?
Absolutely. Historical AI use cases in the AML world often involved identifying patterns in data and generating hard-to-explain rules in a black box. We are very different. We use a new type of AI and we apply it on different use cases.By using Large Language Models we are able to automate the tedious and time consuming L1 tasks by following your specific workflows and policies and leaving a comprehensive audit trail.
Would I have to change my KYC/AML systems to use this?
No, you wouldn't. Diligent integrates seamlessly with your current systems and vendors. You can use our simple UI or integrate our API into your internal tooling. You'll be up and running in a few days, if not hours!
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650731ef9f7d88494ce3e3f2/65b91f33ab7df25bc910be69_Group%2051175.png)](https://godiligent.ai/</>)

generated_description:
**Diligent: Revolutionizing Risk and Compliance in Fintech**

Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S23, Diligent is a Berlin-based startup on a mission to empower fintech risk and compliance teams. Their innovative use of Generative AI (GenAI) is designed to streamline and enhance routine customer due diligence tasks, particularly in the realms of anti-money laundering (AML) and regulatory compliance.

### What Does Diligent Do?

Initially focused on helping fintechs and banks automate essential due diligence, Diligent leverages large language models (LLMs) to significantly cut compliance costs, improve risk detection, and allow teams to focus on more complex investigations. Their offerings include automating workflows that cover everything from thorough checks on business legitimacy to the review of customer documents and managing false positive alerts from AML systems. 

### Key Features

Diligent's suite of tools includes:

- **Web Presence Analysis**: Investigates a business’s online footprint and flags connections to high-risk activities or entities.
- **Ongoing Monitoring**: Keeps track of any changes in business activities that might indicate emerging risks.
- **Risk Assessment**: Provides a holistic view of business relationships through deep dives into industry classification, transaction counterparties, and online presence signals.
- **Screening Automation**: Remediates false positive alerts from existing sanctions and adverse media systems efficiently.
- **Know Your Business (KYB) Assistant**: Validates business information by checking uploaded documents against established protocols.

### The Value Proposition

Diligent aims to usher in a new era in risk and compliance operations. By automating tedious tasks and enhancing risk assessments, they help organizations:

- Reduce time and costs associated with compliance.
- Strengthen overall risk assessment capabilities.
- Minimize friction during the customer onboarding process.

### The Team and Vision

With a small but dedicated team of two, Diligent has the backing of Jared Friedman, a partner at Y Combinator, who lends valuable expertise and vision. Their approach is not about replacing human intelligence but augmenting it; Diligent's AI systems provide a comprehensive audit trail and are designed to integrate seamlessly with existing KYC/AML frameworks without requiring overlord changes.

### Ready to Dive In?

For interested fintech companies, Diligent invites you to explore their innovative solutions. Catch a demo of how they can elevate your compliance operations at [godiligent.ai](https://godiligent.ai).

In a rapidly evolving regulatory landscape, Diligent stands out as a beacon of efficiency and effectiveness in risk and compliance operations. They’re not just helping to tackle compliance; they’re redefining how it’s done.
